name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Ch. Vivia: The Near-Death Detective + Ch. Yakou: Thank You, My Detective
summary:
The fourth DLC for Master Detective Archives: RAIN CODE and final release for the games season pass.

This fourth DLC includes two substories. Ch. Vivia: The Near-Death Detective features Vivia Twilight, the detective with the Forensic Forte "Spectral Projection." Ch. Yakou: Thank You, My Detective features the Head of the Nocturnal Detective Agency, Yakou Furio.
